JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities  Were looking for an SDET engineer for our back-end team.  Catchpoint monitors the service performance of some of the worlds largest companies. As a back-end SDET engineer, youll help in validating the infrastructure of our system work as expected. In the process, you'll learn about our infrastructure, well scaled applications to handle huge data, NoSQL DB, APIs and more-- all with an amazing team of dedicated software development, test automation, and QA engineers in Bangalore and the US.Desired SkillsMinimum of 2 years of automation and tools development. Should have hands on in development experience of C# .NET or Python ScriptingShould be having hands on experience into automation framework developmentDebugging and Failure Analysis are a must for this position Candidate must have a B.E./B.Tech or M.E./M.Tech/MSCS or MCAundergraduate or graduate work in engineering and computer science or equivalent.  Minimum of 2-4 Years of experience required, preferably in automation and tools development.

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, B.Sc in Any Specialization
EDUCATION.PG: MBA/PGDM in Any Specialization, M.Tech in Any Specialization, MCA in Any Specialization, MS/M.Sc(Science) in Any Specialization
